messages.body:
Hi,

I purchased your photo editing plugin but it's not working with the latest version of Lightroom (v12.5). When I try to install it, I get an error saying it's not compatible.

Could you please help me get it working or provide a refund?

Best regards,

Michael

Hi,

Thanks for the quick response. I've already checked the installation guide and my system meets all requirements. I'm using:

- Lightroom v12.5
- macOS Sonoma 14.2.1
- I've tried both the automatic installer and manual installation methods

The error message says: 'Plugin not compatible with this version of Lightroom'

Can you help?

Thanks,
Michael

Hi Michael,

Thank you for providing those details. I've checked and it appears that Lightroom v12.5 requires our latest plugin version (v3.2). You currently have v3.0.

I've added you to our update program and you should receive an email within the next hour with a download link for v3.2, which is fully compatible with Lightroom v12.5.

The update is free for existing customers. Let me know if you don't receive the email or need help with the installation.

Best regards,
Alex
Technical Support

Hi Alex,
It's been a couple of hours but I haven't received the update email yet. Could you please check if it was sent?

Thanks,
Michael

Hi Michael,

I apologize for the delay. I've just resent the update email. You should receive it within the next few minutes. I've also generated a direct download link that you can use right away:

Download Pro Photo Editing Suite v3.2

Please let me know if you need any help with the installation.

Best regards,
Alex

conversation.subject: Plugin Compatibility Issue with Lightroom v12.5
